critical_workflows: Create a new issue in a project
Transition an issue through a workflow

test_scenarios.name: Successful Login and Logout
steps: Navigate to the Jira login page.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the Jira dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: Successful Logout
steps: From the Jira dashboard, click on the user profile icon.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged out and redirected to the login page.

test_scenarios.name: Create a Scrum Project
steps: Click on 'Projects' in the navigation bar.
Choose a project name and key.
test_scenarios.expected_result: A new Scrum project is successfully created and the user is redirected to the project board.

test_scenarios.name: Create a Issue
steps: Enter a summary for the issue.
test_scenarios.expected_result: A new issue is successfully created in the project.

test_scenarios.name: Transition an Issue to 'In Progress'
test_scenarios.expected_result: The issue status is changed to 'In Progress'.

test_scenarios.name: Search an issue by name
steps: Click in the search box in the top navigation bar.
Enter full and correct name of the issue
test_scenarios.expected_result: The correct issue is displayed in the search results.
